import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { fetchGrades } from "../../services/gradeServices" import { fetchSubjects } from "../../services/subjectServices" export const CreateWorksheet = ({ user }) => { const [grades, setGrades] = useState([]) const [userQuestionsAndAnswers, setUserQuestionsAndAnswers] = useState([{ answer: "", hint: "", question: "", userId: user.id }]) const [userWorksheet, setUserWorksheet] = useState({ gradeId: "", imageURL: "", subjectId: "", title: "", userId: user.id }) const [subjects, setSubjects] = useState([]) const addNewLine = (event) => { event.preventDefault() const updatedUserQuestionsAndAnswers = [...userQuestionsAndAnswers, { answer: "", hint: "", question: "", userId: user.id }] setUserQuestionsAndAnswers(updatedUserQuestionsAndAnswers) } const handleFetchGrades = () => { fetchGrades().then((data) => { setGrades(data) }) } const handleFetchSubjects = () => { fetchSubjects().then((data) => { setSubjects(data) }) } const handleRemoveLine = (event, indexToRemove) => { event.preventDefault() const updatedUserQuestionsAndAnswers = userQuestionsAndAnswers.map((userQuestionAndAnswer, index) => { console.log("ðŸš€ ~ file: CreateWorksheet.js:44 ~ updatedUserQuestionsAndAnswers ~ index:", index) if (index === indexToRemove) { return null } return userQuestionAndAnswer }).filter((updatedQuestionAndAnswer) => updatedQuestionAndAnswer !== null) setUserQuestionsAndAnswers(updatedUserQuestionsAndAnswers) } const handleUserQAInput = (event, index) => { const updatedUserQuestionsAndAnswers = [...userQuestionsAndAnswers] updatedUserQuestionsAndAnswers[index][event.target.name] = event.target.value setUserQuestionsAndAnswers(updatedUserQuestionsAndAnswers) } const handleUserWorksheetInput = (event) => { const updatedUserWorksheet = { ...userWorksheet, [event.target.name]: event.target.value } setUserWorksheet(updatedUserWorksheet) } useEffect(() => { handleFetchGrades() handleFetchSubjects() }, []) return ( <>
